company_context: Online Payroll Services | HR Payroll Software | Paycom Looking for your W-2s? Click here. Skip to Main Content Client Employee Accountant COBRA Account Paycom® Logo Login careers investors contact Automate decisions so you can​ focus on the extraordinary With HR and Payroll Full-Solution automation Request meeting See software in action Your job doesn’t have to be a never-ending flood of decisions, data entry and time-consuming administrative tasks. When you have Paycom, employees enter and manage their own HR and payroll in a truly single software . Freeing you to focus on the big stuff. Introducing The industry’s first command-driven AI engine All in a single database, we’ve revolutionized how users find and access employee data. Instead of hunting for the info you need, simply ask IWant. Our AI engine searches employee profiles and management dashboards to deliver instant answers. And because it pulls from data employees entered themselves, the results are reliable, real-time and comprehensive every time — all at your command. Before you navigate, ask IWant. Just Ask Automated Payroll You will stress less when employees do their own payroll Because no one knows their pay better than employees. Beti ® takes payroll off your plate by automatically building it and empowering employees to find and fix errors before it’s run — so it’s always right. Hours? Expenses? Deductions? All pulled live. Beti cut time spent on payroll by 90% . * You simply sit back and monitor the progress. Automate Payroll *A commissioned Total Economic Impact™ study conducted by Forrester Consulting on behalf of Paycom, June 2023. Results are for a composite organization representative of interviewed clients. Truly Single Database You can’t truly automate without a truly single database Automation relies on a seamless flow of data, which is only possible in a single database. Other software might claim to be all-in-one but is a patchwork of multiple systems masquerading as a single solution. Paycom is the only truly single database in the industry. See for yourself No chasing down data Looking for employee data? Simply ask and Paycom’s command-driven AI engine delivers it instantly and accurately. No app hopping User experience matters — you won’t get ping-ponged between different interfaces requiring multiple logins. No data reentry That’s right. Data changes made in one tool populate throughout the entire software. No security weak points We keep all data safe in one place — because more apps mean more data risk. See for yourself “Paycom is the most top-to-bottom, front-to-back, automated software on the market.” Steve Boese HR Technology Conference program co-chair Automated Time-off Decisions You don’t have to drown in decision fatigue Decisions, decisions. Should that time-off request be approved or denied? Employees are waiting. Meanwhile, 50% of requests aren’t decided on until after time off has been taken. GONE ® automates your entire decision-making process so you

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across Paycom and was impressed with the work you're doing in HR and payroll automation. I'd love to explore how our data processing solution can help you optimize your operations.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Hi Alex, I'm John, the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve, but I have to say, our plate is pretty full right now. What makes you think your solution is a good fit for us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, John, our DeepData AI solution can help you process and analyze large datasets more efficiently, which can lead to better decision-making and cost savings. I've seen similar companies in the HR and payroll space benefit greatly from our technology.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but we've already invested heavily in our own automation tools, like Beti and IWant. I'm not sure we're ready to add another vendor to the mix, especially with the integration headaches that come with it.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about integration, John. However, our solution is designed to be modular and can integrate with your existing systems. We've had success with similar implementations in the past. Plus, our pricing is competitive, and we offer a tiered pricing model to fit your needs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the flexibility, but to be honest, our budget for new initiatives is pretty tight right now. We're focused on optimizing our current systems and don't have the resources to devote to a new project. Not to mention, we're in the middle of our quarterly review and can't take on anything new until that's complete.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand the budget constraints and the timing challenge. Perhaps we could discuss a pilot program or a proof-of-concept to demonstrate the value of our solution without a large upfront commitment?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, I appreciate the effort, but I think we're going to have to pass on this for now. We just don't have the bandwidth to take on another project, and our priorities are elsewhere. I appreciate the call, but I think we'll have to decline.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more aggressively addressed the buyer's timing concerns by offering a specific proposal for revisiting the conversation after the quarterly review is complete. Sentiment: Neutral
